players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now before he kills again."
You: "Diana, why are you so sure about Charlie? Did you investigate him?"
Charlie: "Accusing me without proof doesn't help the town, Diana. Alice, if you investigated me, please share your findings so we can be sure before voting."
You: "I didn't investigate anyone, I'm just a villager. Diana, what's your role?"
Charlie: "Accusations without evidence only sow confusion. Diana, your silence is suspicious—if you truly want justice, speak up and share your role or suspicions."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
